summary: Iteration 53 - AI Paper Generator Feature Verification. All requested features verified successfully: Hindi subject shows Hindi chapters in Devanagari script, Drawing/‡§ö‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡§≤‡§æ shows drawing chapters for pre-primary, CLASS_PAPER_DEFAULTS applies correct marks/time per class, Paper Language dropdown has Hindi option, Rhymes subject available for CBSE board pre-primary classes.

context_for_next_testing_agent: AI Paper Generator features verified. Key findings: 1) normalizeSubject() maps Hindi subjects to English keys for chapter lookup 2) CLASS_PAPER_DEFAULTS sets marks/time per class 3) Drawing chapters available for pre-primary with bilingual names 4) Rhymes only in CBSE board subjects, not RBSE/MPBSE
